description: The Fig and Honey cocktail is the recipe for laughter and good times. Its colorful hue is a combination of fig purée and&nbsp;honey. While it seems sweet, this cocktail also has some strength from the vodka.
name: Fig and Honey

recipeInstructions.name: To make the purée, put all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth.
recipeInstructions.text: To make the purée, put all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth.

recipeInstructions.name: Add the fig purée and honey to a shaker to make the cocktail. Stir together with a spoon until well combined.
recipeInstructions.text: Add the fig purée and honey to a shaker to make the cocktail. Stir together with a spoon until well combined.

recipeInstructions.name: Add the remaining ingredients and top with ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Add the remaining ingredients and top with ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake well and strain the mixture into a cocktail glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Shake well and strain the mixture into a cocktail glass.
